# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SSE property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SSE Instructions. A value of true indicates the processor supports the SSE extensions.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SSE
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
